results.title: Home away from home
results.creator_credit: Umit Ugur, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Unlike other immigrants, Umit Ugur didn’t move to Australia in 1981 for economic reasons, instead he migrated here because of love.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Umit Ugur, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Avustralyadan bir enstantane...
results.creator_credit: Bayram Ocal, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Bayram Ocal reflects on his many achievements since migrating to Australia in the late sixties, including contributing to the foundation of a Turkish Islamic society, an Islamic funeral service, a mosque and various Turkish language newspapers.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Bayram Ocal, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Yeni dunyam = My new world
results.creator_credit: Yusuf Hazar, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Migrating to Australia from Ankara, Turkey in 1978, Yusuf Hazar fondly looks back on the life he and his wife created for his six children. Feeling a deep sense of gratitude to his adopted country, Yusuf and his family are committed to helping out others in the community.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Yusuf Hazar, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Migrating to Australia from Ankara, Turkey in 1978, Yusuf Hazar fondly looks back on the life he and his wife created for his six children. Feeling a deep sense of gratitude to his adopted country, Yusuf and his family are committed to helping out others in the community.

results.title: From a small island to a giant continent : the story of a Cypriot Turk
results.creator_credit: Ifran Hassan, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Ifran Hassan recalls leaving his homeland of Cyprus in 1970 to escape the troubled political climate, his destination, Melbourne where he set out to make a new life for himself and to help improve the lives of others.
results.title_for_label: From a small island to a giant continent : the story of a Cypriot Turk
results.creator_credit_for_label: Ifran Hassan, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Without a doubt
results.creator_credit: Lyn Skillern, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: John Rouse, a kind and fun loving man from Yorkshire loved to dress as Santa and even had his own catch phrase, ‘without a doubt’. His daughter-in-law Lyn Skillern and her family remember and pay tribute to him.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Lyn Skillern, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: A Mission from Dog
results.creator_credit: Shirlee McPherson, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Like Shirlee McPherson, her partner Dennis has always loved dogs, which led them to rescuing a neglected border collie and her litter of pups.

results.title: A Chance decision
results.creator_credit: Graham Goulding, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: A chance decision led Graham Goulding into a teaching job in China where the banquets were endless and he and his colleagues were treated like royalty. A unique adventure that has remained with Goulding long after his return to Gippsland.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Graham Goulding, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: In a galaxy far far away  - me and my game
results.brief_description: Born and raised in Mildura, 15 year old Justyn Smith loves to play video games. It keeps him out of trouble and besides roaming around the streets of Mildura is boring anyway! This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Koorie Heritage Trust.

results.title: My pop
results.brief_description: Nick Casey loves his pop who looks after his whole family and taught him how to catch fish. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Koorie Heritage Trust.
